title: How to Defeat Azi Dahaka in Final Fantasy X 2

steps.headline: Start with one girl in the Songstress dressphere and the other two in the Dark Knight or Berserker dresspheres.
steps.description: Equip accessories and/or garment grids that raise your attributes. Start the battle.

steps.headline: Immediately use a Light Curtain to cast Protect on all the girls.
steps.description: This will reduce the damage from his physical attacks. His physical attack appears to have a draining effect, so be sure to do more damage than he can heal at all times.

steps.headline: Have the songstress use Magical Masque -- it will help you later.
Hit Azi Dahaka with all you've got with your Dark Knights or Berserkers while the Songstress is dancing.
After you reduce Azi's HP down, he will start using an attack called Damoceles Photon.
steps.description: This attack is very, very devastating. It does fractional damage based on your Maximum HP. You don't want to be caught off-guard by this attack. This is what Magical Masque is for. Since Damoceles Photon is a magic attack, Magical Masque will completely protect you from it. Make sure the Songstress is dancing at all times, since he can pull this attack out anytime he wishes. If you are hit and the Songstress is not dancing, heal up immediately.

steps.headline: Continue to use Magical Masque and hit Azi with all you got.
steps.description: Darkness by a Dark Knight and a few of the Berserker's attacks work well on him.

steps.headline: After a long battle, you will see him fall for the count.
steps.description: He has 146,200 HP (153,510 HP if oversouled) so it will take a while. Congratulations! You beat him!

text: Start with one girl in the Songstress dressphere and the other two in the Dark Knight or Berserker dresspheres. Equip accessories and/or garment grids that raise your attributes. Start the battle. Immediately use a Light Curtain to cast Protect on all the girls. This will reduce the damage from his physical attacks. His physical attack appears to have a draining effect, so be sure to do more damage than he can heal at all times. Have the songstress use Magical Masque -- it will help you later.  Hit Azi Dahaka with all you've got with your Dark Knights or Berserkers while the Songstress is dancing.  After you reduce Azi's HP down, he will start using an attack called Damoceles Photon. This attack is very, very devastating. It does fractional damage based on your Maximum HP. You don't want to be caught off-guard by this attack. This is what Magical Masque is for. Since Damoceles Photon is a magic attack, Magical Masque will completely protect you from it. Make sure the Songstress is dancing at all times, since he can pull this attack out anytime he wishes. If you are hit and the Songstress is not dancing, heal up immediately. Continue to use Magical Masque and hit Azi with all you got. Darkness by a Dark Knight and a few of the Berserker's attacks work well on him. After a long battle, you will see him fall for the count. He has 146,200 HP (153,510 HP if oversouled) so it will take a while. Congratulations! You beat him!
sentences: Start with one girl in the Songstress dressphere and the other two in the Dark Knight or Berserker dresspheres.
Equip accessories and/or garment grids that raise your attributes.
Start the battle.
Immediately use a Light Curtain to cast Protect on all the girls.
This will reduce the damage from his physical attacks.
His physical attack appears to have a draining effect, so be sure to do more damage than he can heal at all times.
Have the songstress use Magical Masque -- it will help you later.
Hit Azi Dahaka with all you've got with your Dark Knights or Berserkers while the Songstress is dancing.
After you reduce Azi's HP down, he will start using an attack called Damoceles Photon.
This attack is very, very devastating.
It does fractional damage based on your Maximum HP.
You don't want to be caught off-guard by this attack.
This is what Magical Masque is for.
Since Damoceles Photon is a magic attack, Magical Masque will completely protect you from it.
Make sure the Songstress is dancing at all times, since he can pull this attack out anytime he wishes.
If you are hit and the Songstress is not dancing, heal up immediately.
Continue to use Magical Masque and hit Azi with all you got.
Darkness by a Dark Knight and a few of the Berserker's attacks work well on him.
After a long battle, you will see him fall for the count.
He has 146,200 HP (153,510 HP if oversouled) so it will take a while.
Congratulations!
You beat him!
tyn_section: Two Berserkers or Dark Knights, mastered preferably.
